title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Blended Information Literacy Education for Millennial Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three criteria for selecting reliable mathematical educational materials from diverse digital sources.
Learners can perform information-sharing processes with peer pre-service teachers using online collaboration tools with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can self-assess information literacy performance outcomes and develop improvement plans by referencing assessment rubrics within the LMS.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
